name: Market-Validated Scoring
description: Market-validated scoring that combines real-world adoption metrics with technical capabilities for objective evaluations
fullDescription: Our ranking system combines real-world adoption metrics with technical capabilities to provide objective evaluations of AI coding tools. We prioritize measurable data over theoretical assessments.

factors.name: Developer Adoption
factors.details: GitHub Stars (open source tools), VS Code Extension installs, npm/PyPI download volumes, Active user communities, Developer testimonials

factors.name: Technical Performance
factors.details: SWE-bench verified scores, Code quality metrics, Response speed and latency, Context window size, Multi-file editing support

factors.name: Agentic Capability
factors.details: Task planning sophistication, Multi-step problem solving, Self-correction abilities, Tool/API integration, Autonomous iteration

factors.name: Market Traction
factors.details: Enterprise customer adoption, Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR), Funding rounds and valuation, Market penetration, Customer retention

factors.name: Business Sentiment
factors.details: News coverage quality, Industry analyst reports, Customer satisfaction scores, Brand recognition, Market positioning

factors.name: Development Velocity
factors.details: Release frequency, Feature velocity, Bug fix responsiveness, Roadmap execution, Community engagement

factors.name: Innovation
factors.details: Unique technical capabilities, Patent applications, Research publications, Industry firsts, Technical differentiation

factors.name: Platform Resilience
factors.details: Uptime and availability, Error rate metrics, Recovery time, Security posture, Infrastructure quality

verificationStandards: Validate company-provided data against public records

dataSources: GitHub: Stars, forks, contributors, commit activity
Package Registries: npm, PyPI, VS Code Marketplace download stats
Benchmarks: SWE-bench verified scores, HumanEval results
Company Data: Funding announcements, ARR, customer counts
News Analysis: Coverage from tech media and industry publications
Developer Surveys: Community feedback and satisfaction ratings

scoringMethodology.calculation: Overall Score = Σ (Factor Score × Weight × Confidence)
steps: Normalization: Scale raw metrics to 0-100 range
Confidence: Multiply by data completeness factor

changes: Balanced other factors to emphasize proven results
